snapshot_info.narration_text: Put down the empty glass on the countertop using the right hand.

zone_lower_shelf_of_the_door_of_the_frid.name: lower shelf of the door of the fridge

interaction_history.narration_text: stretch the left hand inside the cupboard in the lower shelf to reach a mug
put the mug that is in the right hand under the nozzle of the coffee machine
Do one final stirring clockwise and then remove the wooden stirrer from the mug
pull down the handle of the coffee machine
tilt the milk bottle to pour milk
Tilt the milk bottle up after the milk has been poured. Place the lid from the left hand on top of the milk bottle. Rotate clockwise to close the milk bottle.
Hold the mesh containing oranges using the left hand to free the space to cut it open. Using the right hand, open the scissors and cut the mesh to open it.
Pick up a second orange from the mesh and place it to the left on the counter.
pick up a third orange from inside the mesh and place it on the left at the counter
hold the bowl of the food processor
cut the orange into two halves using the knife
feel through the flattened part of the roll to check where the breaking point is
stir the coffee and the frothed milk in the mug
stir the coffee and the milk frothing using the wooden stirrer but stirring a counter-clockwise
return the cone which is in the right hand inside the milk frother
shake the removed cone using the right hand to remove excess liquid
rinse the cone using both hands under the water running from the tap
wipe the cone using the sponge
flip the orange and place it on the cone of the juice presser
press the orange onto the cone of the juicer
continue pressing and rotating the orange half
flip and place the orange half
Press the orange half on the cone of the juicer using both hands, right hand on top of the orange half and left hand on top of the right hand, and press downwards.
Press the orange half using both hands, right hand on the orange and left hand on the right hand, pressing it downwards on the cone of the juicer.
press the orange half downwards using both hands on the cone of the juicer
press the orange half on the cone of the juicer using both hands
pick up the second half of the orange
pick up one of the halves of the orange using the left hand and pass it to the right hand
Flip the half of the orange using the right hand, place it downwards, facing downwards, on the cone of the juice processor.
pick up the second half of the second orange using the right hand
place the half of the orange facing downwards on the cone of the juicer
place the half orange on the cone of the juicer using the right hand facing downwards
press the half orange on the juicer using both hands
cut the orange into two halves
stop one of the halves of the orange
pick up half of the orange
place the half of the orange on the cone of the juicer facing downwards using the right hand
hit the juicer bowl flipped downwards on the rim of the food recycling bin to get rid of any of its content and throw these inside the food recycling bin
Throw the remaining content inside the juicer by flipping the juicer on top of the food recycling bin and shaking it so that any excess content inside it would fall into the bin.
open the tap so water is running to rinse the juicer bowl
tilt the bowl to empty all the water inside it
rotate the bowl to point downwards and place it on the drainer using the left hand
place the glass now filled with orange juice on the countertop next to the coffee machine
pass the glass from the right hand to the left hand, holding it from its base
place the glass under the tap nozzle
turn the glass upside down to empty the water inside it into the sink using the left hand
turn the glass using the left hand to point upwards
place the glass under the nozzle of the tap, using the left hand holding it from its rim, and open the tap using the right handle with the right hand to fill the glass with water
fill the glass with water from the tap to rinse it
rotate the glass upside down to empty its contents into the sink using the left hand
tilt the water filter to pour water from it into the glass that is on the countertop
tilt the food processor bowl to pour juice into the glass
pass the plate from the right hand to the left hand
pick up one of the mugs from the right side of the sink using the left hand, holding it from its handle
scrub the inside sides of the mug using the sponge
place the mug with the left hand under the tap's nozzle and open the tap using the right handle
move the mug from the left hand to the right hand, holding it from its base, pointing downwards
place the mug in the dishwasher's drawer
Move the mug from the right hand to the left hand holding it from its base and place it under the tap's nozzle.
put the food processing lid on the food processing bowl and rotate it clockwise to lock it in
place the socket on the lid of the food processing bowl
place the kettle under the nozzle of the tap and open the tap using the right handle with the right hand
tilt up the kettle to stop pouring water from it.
open the pasta box by holding it with the left hand and opening the top of it with the right hand
open both sides of the pasta box using both hands
pick up the pasta box using both hands
pour pasta from the pasta box into the plate
close the flaps on top of the pasta box using both hands
unroll the pack of the parmesan cheese using the right hand to check its content
slightly move the plastic box of tomatoes
slightly move the plastic container of the grapes
pick up one fallen piece of pasta
pick up another pasta piece and place it on the plate
pick up the jar of black pepper
put down the jar of black pepper
pick up the glass of water
